description:
Sometimes a zip-up hoodie is better than a pullover, this hoodie is for those times. Made using a midweight blend of cotton and polyester, the Simple Logo hoodie proves that often “simple” is just right.

  • Soft cotton poly blend reduces weight and drying times
  • Handwarmer pockets keep your hands out of the cold
  • Ribbed cuffs and hem keep the cold from creeping in
  • Regular fit wears just like you want it to
name: The North Face Simple Logo Full Zip Hoodie - Men's
